text: Whenever I try to open a PHP file using Apache 2.2.11 running on Windows XP, it shows the contents of the file, not the actual page.
creator: rrb734@aim.com
rpluem@apache.org
text: This is neither a user support forum nor the php bugzilla. Please ask on users@httpd.apache.org first or open a bug against php. In any case you need to provide more details like configuration and error logs.
